00015 TTEOutput::TTEOutput()
00016 {
00017     framesRequested = 0;

00021 void TTEOutput::initialize()
00022 {
00023     cGate *physOutGate = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("mac")->gate("phys$o");
00024     outChannel = physOutGate->findTransmissionChannel();
00025 
00026     ttQueueLengthSignal = registerSignal("ttQueueLength");
00027     beQueueLengthSignal = registerSignal("beQueueLength");
00028 }
00029 
00030 void TTEOutput::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00031 {
00032     if (msg->arrivedOn("TTin"))
00033     {
00034         //TODO THIS ASSERT IS ONLY FOR DEBUGGING PURPOSES! Later it might be allowed to queue TTframes!?!?
00035         ASSERT(framesRequested > 0);
00036         ASSERT(framesRequested == 1);
00037         //TODO Hier überprüfen ob das so ok ist, insbesondere müssen die Buffer auch "leere" messages schicken damit der Buffer weiter gesetzt wird!
00038         ttBuffersPos = (++ttBuffersPos % ttBuffers.size());
00039 
00040         //If we have an empty message allow other frame to be sent
00041         if (dynamic_cast<TTBufferEmpty *> (msg))
00042         {
00043             if (framesRequested)
00044             {
00045                 framesRequested--;
00046                 requestPacket();
00047             }
00048             delete msg;
00049         }
00050         //Else send frame
00051         else
00052         {
00053             if (framesRequested)
00054             {
00055                 framesRequested--;
00056                 send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00057             }
00058             else
00059             {
00060                 ttQueue.insert(msg);
00061                 emit(ttQueueLengthSignal, ttQueue.length());
00062             }
00063         }
00064     }
00065     else if (msg->arrivedOn("RCin"))
00066     {
00067         if (framesRequested && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) msg))
00068         {
00069             framesRequested--;
00070 
00071             //Reset Bag
00072             RCBuffer *rcBuffer = dynamic_cast<RCBuffer*> (msg->getSenderModule());
00073             if (rcBuffer)
00074                 rcBuffer->resetBag();
00075             send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00076         }
00077         else
00078         {
00079             int priority = msg->getSenderModule()->par("priority").longValue();
00080             if (priority > 0 && priority < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES)
00081             {
00082                 rcQueue[priority].insert(msg);
00083             }
00084             else
00085             {
00086                 rcQueue[0].insert(msg);
00087                 ev << "Priority missing!" << endl;
00088             }
00089         }
00090     }
00091     //Frames arrived on in are best-effort frames
00092     else if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00093     {
00094         // If there are framesRequested the MAC layer is currently idle
00095         if (framesRequested && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) msg))
00096         {
00097             framesRequested--;
00098             send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00099         }
00100         else
00101         {
00102             beQueue.insert(msg);
00103             emit(beQueueLengthSignal, beQueue.length());
00104         }
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void TTEOutput::registerTTBuffer(TTBuffer *ttBuffer)
00109 {
00110     Enter_Method("registerTTBuffer(%s)", ttBuffer->getName());
00111     int sendWindowStart = ttBuffer->par("sendWindowStart");
00112     for (std::vector<TTBuffer*>::iterator buffer = ttBuffers.begin(); buffer != ttBuffers.end();)
00113     {
00114         ++buffer;
00115         if (buffer == ttBuffers.end() || (*buffer)->par("sendWindowStart").longValue() > sendWindowStart)
00116         {
00117             ttBuffers.insert(buffer, ttBuffer);
00118             //Now doublecheck that the schedule is not overlapping for this port
00119             for (std::vector<TTBuffer*>::iterator buffer2 = ttBuffers.begin(); buffer2 != ttBuffers.end();)
00120             {
00121                 Buffer *tmpBuffer = *buffer2;
00122                 ++buffer2;
00123                 if (buffer2 != ttBuffers.end() && (tmpBuffer->par("sendWindowEnd").longValue() > (*buffer2)->par(
00124                         "sendWindowStart").longValue()))
00125                 {
00126                     opp_error("Port cannot be scheduled due to overlapping schedules: %s and %s", tmpBuffer->getName(),
00127                             (*buffer2)->getName());
00128                 }
00129             }
00130             return;
00131         }
00132     }
00133     //This should only happen if buffer was empty
00134     ttBuffers.push_back(ttBuffer);
00135 }
00136 
00137 void TTEOutput::finish()
00138 {
00139     ttQueue.clear();
00140     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00141     {
00142         rcQueue[i].clear();
00143     }
00144     beQueue.clear();
00145 }
00146 
00147 void TTEOutput::requestPacket()
00148 {
00149     Enter_Method("requestPacket()");
00150     //Feed the MAC layer with the next frame
00151     framesRequested++;
00152 
00153     //TTFrames
00154     if (!ttQueue.isEmpty())
00155     {
00156         framesRequested--;
00157         cMessage *msg = (cMessage*) ttQueue.pop();
00158         emit(ttQueueLengthSignal, ttQueue.length());
00159 
00160         //TODO Update buffers:
00161         ttBuffersPos = (ttBuffersPos + 1) % ttBuffers.size();
00162 
00163         send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00164         return;
00165     }
00166     //RCFrames
00167     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00168     {
00169         if (!rcQueue[i].isEmpty() && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) rcQueue[i].front()))
00170         {
00171             framesRequested--;
00172             EtherFrame *message = (EtherFrame*) rcQueue[i].pop();
00173             //Reset Bag
00174             RCBuffer *rcBuffer = dynamic_cast<RCBuffer*> (message->getSenderModule());
00175             if (rcBuffer)
00176                 rcBuffer->resetBag();
00177             send(message, gateBaseId("out"));
00178             return;
00179         }
00180     }
00181     //BEFrames
00182     if (!beQueue.isEmpty() && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) beQueue.front()))
00183     {
00184         framesRequested--;
00185         send((cMessage*) beQueue.pop(), gateBaseId("out"));
00186         emit(beQueueLengthSignal, beQueue.length());
00187         return;
00188     }
00189 }
00190 
00191 bool TTEOutput::isTransmissionAllowed(EtherFrame *message)
00192 {
00193     if (!outChannel)
00194     {
00195         return false;
00196     }
00197     //If there are no ttBuffers everything is fine
00198     if (ttBuffers.size() == 0)
00199     {
00200         return true;
00201     }
00202     TTEScheduler *scheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00203     //SimTime sendTime = (message->getBitLength()+INTERFRAME_GAP_BITS)/txRate;
00204     SimTime sendTime = outChannel->calculateDuration(message);
00205     //Don't know if that is right, but it works!
00206     sendTime += (INTERFRAME_GAP_BITS + ((PREAMBLE_BYTES + SFD_BYTES) * 8)) / outChannel->getNominalDatarate();
00207     unsigned long sendTicks = ceil((sendTime / scheduler->par("tick")).dbl());
00208     unsigned long startTicks = ttBuffers[ttBuffersPos]->par("sendWindowStart").longValue();
00209     unsigned long endTicks = ttBuffers[ttBuffersPos]->par("sendWindowEnd").longValue();
00210 
00211     //Send Window Start is in next cycle
00212     if (scheduler->getTicks() > startTicks)
00213     {
00214         startTicks += scheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00215         endTicks += scheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00216     }
00217     //Send Window End is in next cycle
00218     else if (scheduler->getTicks() > endTicks)
00219     {
00220         endTicks += scheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00221     }
00222 
00223     //TODO: Perhaps more complex calculations needed?
00224     if ((scheduler->getTicks() + sendTicks) >= startTicks)
00225     {
00226         ev << "transmission not allowed!" << endl;
00227         return false;
00228     }
00229     return true;
00230 }
00231 
00232 int TTEOutput::getNumPendingRequests()
00233 {
00234     return framesRequested;
00235 }
00236 
00237 bool TTEOutput::isEmpty()
00238 {
00239     bool empty = true;
00240     empty &= ttQueue.isEmpty();
00241     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00242     {
00243         empty &= rcQueue[i].isEmpty();
00244     }
00245     empty &= beQueue.isEmpty();
00246     return empty;
00247 }
00248 void TTEOutput::clear()
00249 {
00250     beQueue.clear();
00251     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00252     {
00253         rcQueue[i].clear();
00254     }
00255     ttQueue.clear();
00256     framesRequested = 0;
00257 }
